title: Best webseries in 2022 -by manna
content:
10 Top Web Series In World

Game of Thrones (2011)

IMDB Rating- 9.2

Genre- Action, Adventure, Drama

Star cast- Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington

Winter is indeed coming! Do not wait for the White Walkers to come and knock at your doors. For people who did not get the reference, your lucky stars have driven you to our blog. Game of Thrones is considered the magnum opus of web series. GOT stands irreplaceably on the list of top web series in world. With fantastic characters and an intriguing storyline, the show has a massive fan following throughout the world.

Peaky Blinders (2014)

IMDB Rating- 8.8

Genre- Crime, Drama

Star Cast- Cillian Murphy, Paul Anderson, Helen McCory

Thomas Shelby has become a brand. Peaky Blinders is one of the most popularly watched shows of all time. The show continues to be one of the top web series in the world. The storyline revolves around a gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.  Peaky Blinders is also popular for its aesthetics and background settings.

FRIENDS (1994)

IMDB Rating- 8.8

Genre- Comedy, Romance

Star Cast- Jennifer Aniston, Courtney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, David Schwimmer, Mathew Perry, Matt Le Blanc

FRIENDS remains the most hugely watched sitcom of all time. The web series stands atop the list of top web series of the world. The show and its character invoke homely and heartwarming feelings within the viewers and audience. FRIENDS  is the most popularly watched show. The most anticipated ‘FRIENDS Reunion’ secured millions of views on the internet and broke records with over millions of views.

Money Heist/La casa de papel (2017)

 

IMDB Rating- 8.2

Genre- Action, Crime, Drama

Star Cast- Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño

Bella Ciao is our official anthem! We have reached that stage now where Tokyo, Paris, Berlin, and Nairobi are no longer the names of cities. Since its launch, Money Heist has become a viewers’ favorite. The story revolves around a heist by a mastermind (the Professor) and his disoriented pupils.
author: mannade
metadesc: here you find best web series which you gona watch
